name: arstechnica
text: "Samurai cinema" isn't just a grayscale filter with a film-grain effect; it also includes a total rebalancing of light levels. We're now officially tempted to play the entire game in this mode when it launches on PlayStation 4 consoles on July 17. https://t.co/AOrXJYIXqp
